item.title: Exiv2 v0.26 slipstream
item.description: Release

item.title: Exiv2 v0.26
item.description: Release

item.title: Window dressing
item.description: New and more functional web pages.

item.title: Exiv2 0.25 released
item.description: A large collection of new features, new lenses and bugfixes.

item.title: We have moved
item.description: The Exiv2 website and Redmine sites have moved.

item.title: Exiv2 0.24 released
item.description: Support for reading video metadata, makernote updates, bugfixes.

item.title: GIMP meets (g)exiv2
item.description: GIMP gets advanced Exif, XMP, IPTC metadata support

item.title: Exiv2 0.23 released
item.description: Write support for Canon CR2 raw images, bugfixes.

item.title: Exiv2 0.22 released
item.description: Postscript (EPS) support, MSVC 64 bit project.

item.title: Exiv2 0.21.1 released
item.description: Bugfixes.

item.title: Exiv2 0.21 released
item.description: Samsung SRW and Makernote support, API changes.

item.title: Exiv2 0.20 released
item.description: Makernote updates, ORF write support.

item.title: Exiv2 0.19 released
item.description: TIFF performance improvements and Nikon updates.

item.title: Exiv2 0.18.2 released
item.description: Bugfix release.

item.title: Exiv2 0.18.1 released
item.description: Writes to PSD and reads from RW2 images.

item.title: Community website
item.description: dev.exiv2.org hosts all project resources.

item.title: Exiv2 0.18 released
item.description: It's official: Exiv2 writes to TIFF images.

item.title: Exiv2 0.18-pre2
item.description: Windows DLL, image previews.

item.title: Exiv2 0.18-pre1
item.description: Write-support for TIFF, PNG and JP2 images.

item.title: Exiv2 0.17.1 released
item.description: Important bugfixes.

item.title: Exiv2 0.17 released
item.description: Conversion of Exif and IPTC to/from XMP, JP2 and PSD support.

item.title: API documentation
item.description: The complete API documentation is now available online.

item.title: Exiv2 0.16 released
item.description: XMP support also for MSVC, bugfixes, enhancements.

item.title: Exiv2 0.16-pre1
item.description: XMP support, Olympus ORF format and Pentax makernotes.

item.title: XMP testing
item.description: XMP support is ready for testing.

item.title: XMP support
item.description: Support for XMP metadata is being developed.

item.title: Exiv2 0.15 released
item.description: Maintenance release, support for Minolta G500 RAW files.

item.title: Exiv2 0.14 released
item.description: Proper library versioning, small fixes and features.

item.title: Exiv2 0.13 released
item.description: National Language Support, Fujifilm RAF read-support, ...

item.title: Internationalisation
item.description: Exiv2 with NLS is ready to be translated.

item.title: Exiv2 0.12 released
item.description: Maintenance release with bugfixes and minor features.

item.title: Exiv2 0.11 released
item.description: Adds PNG and ARW support, a Canon makernote update, performance improvements and more.

item.title: Duallicensing
item.description: Exiv2 is now also available with a licence for use in closed-source projects.

item.title: Exiv2 0.10 released
item.description: Read support for TIFF, NEF, CR2, PEF, SR2, DNG and MRW images. Minolta makernote support.

item.title: Announcing exiv2.org
item.description: The Exiv2 project now has its own domain, www.exiv2.org

item.title: Exiv2 0.9.1 released
item.description: Fixes a bug which could cause an invalid Exif user comment tag to be written to images.

item.title: Exiv2 0.9 released
item.description: Adds Canon CRW write support and new utility features to manipulate image file timestamps and fix Nikon ISO settings.

item.title: Exiv2 0.8 released
item.description: Canon CRW read support, bugfixes and other incremental improvements. Added a manual page for the utility.

item.title: Vizrea agreement
item.description: A license agreement allows Vizrea to use Exiv2 in their proprietary products. In return, they will make their changes available to the free version.

item.title: Exiv2 0.7 released
item.description: Design changes in the library, new Olympus, Panasonic and basic Sony makernotes and updated Canon and Nikon makernotes.

item.title: Exiv2 0.6.2 released
item.description: New utility features, some bugfixes, and an improved build environment.

item.title: Exiv2 0.6.1 released
item.description: Fixes a bug that could lose the thumbnail when Exif tags were modified and adds metadata write support to the utility.

item.title: Support forum added
item.description: There is now a Yahoo! group for Exiv2 help and discussions.

item.title: Exiv2 0.6 released
item.description: More IPTC functions in the utility, library support for the creation of all Exif metadata from scratch and more.

item.title: Source online
item.description: The Exiv2 source code repository and a public bug tracking system are now online.

item.title: Exiv2 0.5 released
item.description: IPTC metadata read and write support, an autoconf configure script, MSVC project files.

item.title: Exif keys changed
item.description: With release 0.5 all Exif key values in existing applications need to be updated.

item.title: Exiv2 0.4 released
item.description: Support for Nikon makernotes, improved handling of corrupt IFDs, more intuitive command line parsing for the Exiv2 utility and more.

item.title: Nikon tags added
item.description: Tags for three different Nikon makernote formats are now supported and available on the website.
